text: @senatemajldr Well, let's see @senatemajldr: You're cutting education $$, all the PPP $$ went to big corporations that didn't need it, so that's covered GOP-style, and you're daddy @realDonaldTrump killed 157,000 people by shutting down the CDC, not responding to #COVID19, defunding PPE - DONE
